# automatic

**Type Property**

A value that allows the framework to choose an appropriate callout style automatically.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: MapItemDetailSelectionAccessoryStyle { get }
```

## Accessory styles

- **callout**: The accessory, shown as an annotation callout on the map.
- **caption**: An “Open in Apple Maps” link below the content’s label.
- **sheet**: The map item detail sheet.
